it.polimi.sw2019.controller

Class Payment

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.controller.Payment

  • public class Payment
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    poligenius, lentinip this class was written to manage all the choices made by the client related to a payment of a weapon or a powerup or an effect

        public Powerup getUsablePowerup()

      • reset

        public void reset()
        This method reset all the attributes to avoid errors the next time I receive a new payment message I don't need to reset the pendingMessage or the payingPlayer cause they are overwritten every time in the paymentStarter method

      • payAndContinue

        public void payAndContinue()
        Pay the Ammo cost with Ammo and Powerups and continue the pending action based on the pendingMessage.

      • payAndThanUsePowerup

        public void payAndThanUsePowerup(Colors color)
        Pay the Ammo cost with Ammo and continue the pending action based on the pendingMessage. used to pay targeting scope
        Parameters:
        color - color selected

      • payAndThanUsePowerup

        public void payAndThanUsePowerup(int powerupIndex)
        pay the Ammo cost with powerup used to pay targeting scope
        Parameters:
        powerupIndex - index of the powerup discarded to pay the cost

      • checkPaymentMethod

        public void checkPaymentMethod()
        Checks if the player can pay with a powerup. If the player can pay shows wich powerups can use. Otherwise pays (calls payAndContinue)

      • paymentHandler

        public void paymentHandler(Message message)
        Updates the left cost and handles if the client doesn't want to pay with Powerups anymore (if the powerup index is negative). Calls checkPaymentMethod() and payAndContinue().
        Parameters:
        message - Message with the powerup choice.

      • paymentStarter

        public void paymentStarter(Message message)
        Called the fist time you have to pay. Sets the attributes in the instance of the class. NOTE: Before calling this method for USEPOWERUP check first if there's actually a Powerup and if it has a cost.
        Parameters:
        message - message that has to be executed at the end of the payment

      • powerupCostHandler

        public void powerupCostHandler()
        NOTE: for paying a powerup that has a generic single ammo cost. Checks if the player can pay with a powerup. If the player can pay shows wich powerups can use. Otherwise pays (calls payAndContinue)
